attributes.action: Re-consider proposals to raise the cost of military housing rent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Plans are in place to raise the cost of military housing rent, to equal that of local authorities. A move that could increase rent upto 3 or 4 times the current amount and place more and more families into financial difficulty. This will also make it almost impossible to save for a mortgage prior to leaving the services.
